channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: So much dog mess, 24th June
item.description:

item.title: Grass needs cutting, 24th June
item.description:
This has been reported numerous times as the grass is far too long, it looks unsightly and harbours dog mess and rubbish. You have stated it will be cut numerous times and yet it is still not being done. Please can this be address as a matter of urgency?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Church Hill, Goddington, Orpington, London
